rows.label: qev040602_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah! BLADE friend! Perfect timing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0002
rows.name:
Super hungry critters have been chasing poor Muimui
for hours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0003
rows.name:
Muimui and friend are both BLADEs, and BLADEs help
each other. So hurry and help Muimui![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Muimui that his brother sent you.

rows.label: qev040602_JNK0020
rows.name: Assure[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_SEL0021
rows.name: Wax poetic about proving the bond shared by BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0010
rows.name: Good. That make this simple. Now here they come![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0013
rows.name:
And the best part is, bond is free!
...Uh-oh, here they come![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0020
rows.name: Whew! Friend really did come at best possible time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0021
rows.name: Muimui finally locate Sword of Legendaryness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0022
rows.name:
But when Muimui go to investigate source of signal,
bad things show up and... Well, friend knows the rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0023
rows.name:
Muimui doubt he could manage them alone,
so Muimui has been frantically thinking up plan
while running for life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_JNK0030
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Muimui where the Sword of Legendaryness is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_SEL0041
rows.name: Express relief that Muimui is safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0030
rows.name:
Legen-dar signal points to boss of critters.
Most likely in belly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0031
rows.name: Dumb greedyguts must have gobbled up sword![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0034
rows.name:
There is no monster Muimui can't run from thanks to
Infinigoggles made by Moimoi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0035
rows.name:
But meh-meh-meh about that. Muimui need friend to
go retrieve Sword of Legendaryness right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0036
rows.name:
Legen-dar signal is coming from boss of monsters.
Most likely belly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0039
rows.name:
Muimui will send along location of critter nest.
Go beat them up quick, same as ones just now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0040
rows.name:
Once Muimui gets sword and makes cash mountain,
friend will be rewarded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0041
rows.name:
One free dinn... Er, lunch! Yes. One lunch.
Very generous. Now go forth and conquer![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0044
rows.name:
Muimui followed Legen-dar signal to nest of boss
of those critters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0045
rows.name: Sword of Legendaryness sure to be inside belly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0046
rows.name:
Please get sword for sake of Muimui and Moimoi!
Also for sake of bank account.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0050
rows.name:
So it WAS inside belly of boss! Nopon Sword of
Legendaryness is finally found.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0052
rows.name:
Now Muimui and Moimoi can finally go from being
dumb poor to stupid rich![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0053
rows.name:
It is all thanks to help of friend!
Muimui must hurry back to show Moimoi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0054
rows.name:
Muimui also owe friend one free lunch.
Hurry back to New LA before offer expires![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0059
rows.name: No... That can't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040602_MSG0060
rows.name: Such hard work and no Sword of Legendaryness?[ST:wait ]
